description: SellerApp is an analytics platform which helps Ecommerce Sellers to scale their revenue through a Self-Served platform. The SaaS product provides intelligence for the top third-party sellers across various Marketplace channels.

My roles and responsibilities include developing and testing responsive web interfaces for https://sellerapp.com/ and https://dashboard.sellerapp.com/ . I worked with product managers, UX designers to make sure that the website met all design and usability standards.

projects.description: SellerApp’s site was initially developed using AngularJS . The site was moved to angular in this project

The existing dashboard was cumbersome and was hard to navigate. A new dashboard was built from scratch which increased the usability and was considerably faster than the previous version.The dashboard was entirely built using Angular.

projects.projectName: Run The Business work for SellerApp Dashboard and tool
projects.description: There was a lot of work involving implementing new features in the dashboard, incorporating new APIs to the front end, making front end changes as per the design changes etc. This was all done on a regular basis.

description: CVS Health is one of America’s leading health solutions companies. I was mainly responsible for developing and maintaining the deals and rewards web app.

projects.description: I was involved in the development of new features, Fixing bugs and was responsible for Running the Business. This involved working with the engineering, product and UX team in an Agile setting.

When the entire company moved to monorepo, the deals and rewards web app had to move to monorepo as well. As part of this we had to get rid of the bootstrap and use TailWind classes exclusively. Also migrated the app to Angular 14.

projects.projectName: Developing Reusable Stencil components for Deals And Rewards
projects.description: The reusable components allowed other teams to make use of the capabilities deals and rewards team had built for coupon management.
